health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Hamida Noor, Hon. Tobias Samba, Hon. Kizito Opeya, Hon. Mwaka Mwaludonda, Hon. Benard Ogutu, Hon. Tobias Samba, Hon. Leila, Hon. Aran Moses, Hon. Athmani Shebe
health_data_challenges: The department's main challenge has been finances to fund the proposed project.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Provide budgetary support from the County to fund the project and serve the residents of Mwagosi in Changamwe.
health_sector_decisions: Solution made to put up four water lines funded by Constituency Development Fund (CDF) office at Bokole to Mwagosi village.
health_evidence_base: Document from the Chief Officer Department of Water was used as evidence.
health_evidence_requested: No specific health information requested from anyone.
